ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Largos Absonant Binding (lvl 51)
ygData.msgSnippet: Good question.  Do mobs have Agility and is their ac partially derived from that?  It is apparent their movement speed is as when wounded they slow down due to
ygData.messageBody:
Good question. Do mobs have Agility and is their ac partially derived from
that? It is apparent their movement speed is as when wounded they slow down
due to lost agility as do PC's. It is hard to say whether this affect
occurs on mobs as well. What happens when you use it on a mob around level
5 or so? They should have more than 16 AC but I imagine the loss might
still bring them to zero AC.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 06, 2001 2:52 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Largos Absonant Binding (lvl 51)


So is it safe to assume that when you hit a mob with the 51 song, their
agility is also lowered less than 75 and as a result the total AC debuff
from this song is close to 60+?

Galtin of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 06, 2001 11:42 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Largos Absonant Binding (lvl 51)


Remember agility effects AC, and going below 75 agility lowers ac alot.

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, February 06, 2001 1:34 PM
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Largos Absonant Binding (lvl 51)
>
>
> I hit myself with this song last night to test it out. My
> agility dropped
> 45 pts like the info below states. However, my AC dropped
> over 60 pts, 65
> IIRC, which is a big difference from 16 as listed below.
> Anyone know why
> there is a disparity between the two numbers? Does the song work
> differently against PCs versus NPCs? In other words, PCs
> lose 60+ AC while
> NPCs only lose 16-18 AC.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, February 06, 2001 7:11 AM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Largos Absonant Binding (lvl 51)
>
>
> You can get a program from http://www.eqcaster.com that will
> "parse" the
> spell database and show the client side info:
>
> Largo`s Absonant Binding
> Decrease Armor Class (AC) from 16 (L51) to 18 (L60)
> Decrease Attack Speed for between 30% (L51) to 35% (L60)
> Decrease Movement between 52% (L51) to 61% (L60)
> Decrease Agility from 45 (L51) to 50 (L60)
>
> Sylly
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 8:52 PM
> To: EQBards
> Subject: [eqbards] Largos Absonant Binding (lvl 51)
>
>
> Whats the slow percentage for this song? It isn't listed on
> the EQSongs
> website. I assume it is 30% like Chains and Largos but just want to
> confirm.
>
> Thanks
> Galtin of E'ci
